title: Pablo Escobar's Brother Threatens Apple, Accuses Elon Musk Of Stealing Flamethrower Idea
text:
Roberto De Jesus Escobar Gaviria, brother of late drug lord Pablo Escobar, wants to take down SpaceX and Tesla CEO Elon Musk for stealing the idea for his Boring Company Flame Thrower from Pablo Escobar Inc.

Reuters

According to a report by TNW, this statement came right after he won a $3 million legal war for acquiring PabloEscobar.com domain. If you go to PabloEscobar.com today, you won't find anything.

However, the self-proclaimed heir to the Pablo Escobar trademark wishes to sell merchandise and products, along with the flamethrower -- the idea for which was allegedly stolen from Escobar Inc by Elon Musk.

The Boring Company

Escobar Inc COO Daniel Reitberg said in an email to TNW, "Yes [the flamethrower] will be [available], at $249 per piece. Elon Musk will go down soon, we are preparing some huge cases against him. He will regret not paying us, just like everyone else has regretted it."

Escobar Inc's CEO Olof Gustaffson told TNW, "Pablo Escobar spent hundreds of millions of dollars maintaining his image. We are the only true rights holders of anything relating to Pablo Escobar. People need to realize this and contact us for licensing deals. Anybody that does anything relating to Pablo Escobar without our consent will be punished. We are not scared to put up a legal fight for years if that is what it takes."

PRNewswire

Escobar Gaviria added to this, saying, "Escobar Inc is the only true owner of anything relating to Pablo Escobar. Infringers need to stop."

This isn't it. Escobar Inc also plans to start a $50 million tech company, which according to him will beat Apple to a pulp. While there is not much information about this at the moment, this could be in reference to its own cryptocurrency that it launched sometime last year called 'Diet Bitcoin' which were available for purchase in batches of $2, $50, $100 and $1000.
